items.title: Awesome Graphql
items.content_text:
### Go / React

*   [grpc-graphql-gateway (‚≠ê409)](https://github.com/ysugimoto/grpc-graphql-gateway) - A protoc plugin that generates graphql execution code from Protocol Buffers.
    <a name="go-example" />
items.content_html:
Go / React

  • grpc-graphql-gateway (‚≠ê409) - A protoc plugin that generates graphql execution code from Protocol Buffers.

items.title: Awesome Lit
items.content_text:
### Starter Templates

*   [Lit Sass JavaScript Starter (‚≠ê1)](https://github.com/e111077/lit-sass-js-starter) - Project that has a simple setup for SASS + JS + Lit, using Rollup.
*   [Lit Sass TypeScript Starter (‚≠ê25)](https://github.com/e111077/lit-sass-ts-starter) - Project that has a simple setup for SASS + TS + Lit, using Rollup.
*   [Vite Lit Element TS SASS (‚≠ê75)](https://github.com/e111077/vite-lit-element-ts-sass) - Example Vite project using Lit 2, Typescript, and SASS.

### Examples

*   [Polymer ‚Üí Lit Migration Guide](https://kevinpschaaf.github.io/lit-migration-guide) - Code examples showing migration guidance from Polymer to Lit.

### Component Libraries

*   [Furo Webcomponents (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/eclipse/eclipsefuro-web) - Enterprise ready set of web components which work best with Eclipse Furo.
*   [Fusion Web Components (‚≠ê12)](https://github.com/equinor/fusion-web-components) - Ser of web components used by Equinor Fusion.
*   [Titanium Elements (‚≠ê19)](https://github.com/LeavittSoftware/titanium-elements) - Collection of lightweight web components used by Leavitt Group Enterprises.
items.content_html:
Starter Templates

  • Lit Sass JavaScript Starter (‚≠ê1) - Project that has a simple setup for SASS + JS + Lit, using Rollup.
  • Lit Sass TypeScript Starter (‚≠ê25) - Project that has a simple setup for SASS + TS + Lit, using Rollup.
  • Vite Lit Element TS SASS (‚≠ê75) - Example Vite project using Lit 2, Typescript, and SASS.

Examples

  • Polymer ‚Üí Lit Migration Guide - Code examples showing migration guidance from Polymer to Lit.

Component Libraries

  • Furo Webcomponents (‚≠ê12) - Enterprise ready set of web components which work best with Eclipse Furo.
  • Fusion Web Components (‚≠ê12) - Ser of web components used by Equinor Fusion.
  • Titanium Elements (‚≠ê19) - Collection of lightweight web components used by Leavitt Group Enterprises.

items.title: Awesome Django
items.content_text:
### Third-Party Packages / Editors

*   [django-business-logic (‚≠ê233)](https://github.com/dgk/django-business-logic) - Visual DSL framework for Django.
*   [django-tinymce (‚≠ê1.3k)](https://github.com/jazzband/django-tinymce) - TinyMCE integration for Django.

### Third-Party Packages / Forms

*   [django-shapeshifter (‚≠ê175)](https://github.com/kennethlove/django-shapeshifter) - A class-based view to handle multiple forms in one view.

### Resources / Community

*   [Django Forum](https://forum.djangoproject.com/) - Official Discourse board.
items.content_html:
Third-Party Packages / Editors

  • django-business-logic (‚≠ê233) - Visual DSL framework for Django.
  • django-tinymce (‚≠ê1.3k) - TinyMCE integration for Django.

Third-Party Packages / Forms

items.title: Awesome Vite
items.content_text:
### Templates / Vue 3

*   [naive-ui-dashboard-template (‚≠ê60)](https://github.com/Innei/naive-ui-dashboard-template) - UI friendly, Vue 3 + TSX + TailwindCSS 2 JIT + PostCSS + Naive UI.

### Framework-agnostic Plugins / Integrations

*   [vite-plugin-comlink (‚≠ê215)](https://github.com/mathe42/vite-plugin-comlink) - Use WebWorkers with the power of [Comlink (‚≠ê12k)](https://github.com/GoogleChromeLabs/comlink) to make them enjoyable.
items.content_html:

items.title: Quick Look Plugins
items.content_text:
### More

### [Peek](https://bigzlabs.com/peek) üí∞

> Peek allows you to copy and find text, jump to line numbers, render Github-flavored Markdown with a generated table of contents, restore scroll positions, highlight syntax, & more in the Quick Look previews of over 300 file extensions.

Purchase on the [App Store](https://apps.apple.com/app/peek-quick-look-extension/id1554235898).

*The app is abandoned and buggy, but still functional.*

[![](https://github.com/sindresorhus/quick-look-plugins/raw/main/screenshots/Peek.png)](https://bigzlabs.com/peek)
items.content_html:
More

Peek üí∞

Peek allows you to copy and find text, jump to line numbers, render Github-flavored Markdown with a generated table of contents, restore scroll positions, highlight syntax, & more in the Quick Look previews of over 300 file extensions.

Purchase on the App Store.

The app is abandoned and buggy, but still functional.
